title: OCRing Document
description: A schema for OCR-ing and documenting

tags.description: An array of 3 to 10 tags which make the document easier to find.

title.description: An appropriate title of the document which you think is fitting.

date.description: The date associated with the document

summary.description: A summary of the document Based on your understanding.

fullText.description: The full text of the document

conclusion.description: What you learned from the document
